channel.title: Change to the runescape rules lol
channel.description:
Hi this is a new thread, this is going to become popular!!!
Please dont follow ANY of jagex's rules No free bumps Don't have fun!!!
Go to the RS forums, copy and paste what f-mods say, and then tweak it!
heres me first one:
Please refrain from posting spam-dogs in the Moparscape forums. If you cannot think of any particular relish to eat, read other peoples tomatoes and post thoughtful hamburgers.
Any message/restaurant that serves no condiments, or breaks forum desserts , is considered spam-dogging. Please read the Moparscape Code of Condiments, and the Moparscape Forum Specific Foods, before you continue to eat up the forums.
lol your turns[br][size=1]Posted at: October 29, 2006, 01:52:09 PM[/size][hr]post already :mad:
